ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Most people just go with a combine weapon until their high teens or 20 s when they can start ripping them from the hands of the MOBs that carry better ones.
ygData.messageBody:
Most people just go with a combine weapon until their high teens or 20's
when they can start ripping them from the hands of the MOBs that carry
better ones. (Or unless you have a higher level character or friend that
wants to subsidize you. :)

Bandor, Barbarian Warrior








ZWANENJ@... on 05/14/99 11:10:47 AM

Please respond to warriors_eq@onelist.com








To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

cc: (bcc: Terry Chlebek/DPT)



Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Weapons









From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>

Im level 14, preferably 1 handed slashing....with dual wield and double
attack coming up next level....have any good ideas?
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> I am in search of new and wonderfull weapons. I am asking you if you
> have seen any extraordinary weapons during your travels, and if so where?
> I
> would appreciate all the help i can get. I feel that my minotaur axe isnt
> doing my strength justice, i am sipmly not satsfied with not having a
> magical weapon as well!
>
> Good hunting to you all!
>
> Lothaniel T'Kazz
